platforms.name: CoinList
platforms.intro: Register on CoinList for the upcoming Ocean Token Distribution.

platforms.name: Fractal
platforms.intro: Use Fractal if you participated in the Pre-Launch phase in March 2018.

tokeninfo.title: The Ocean Token
tokeninfo.description: Ocean Protocol uses an ERC20 token, as a means of value exchange, to incentivize keepers of the network and for staking & curation. Ocean Tokens will be issued in a limited supply over an extended period of time.
metrics: Learn more in our Token Distribution Whitepaper
